972650.name: Actual Volleyball
972650.description:
Just like everyone else in the world, you probably love volleyball. That's so cool!

Actual Volleyball, the game someone maybe once talked about, is the most realistic volleyball simulation ever made.

Features:

  • 1v1 local volleyball action (play against a friend).
  • 2v2 local volleyball action (play in teams).
  • Single player practice mode (play against yourself).

And that's it!

————————————————————————

What People are Saying:


"Borderline criminal user experience design."
- Kyle

"This could be really fun if everything about it was different."
- Sanantha

————————————————————————

Read Before Buying:

PLEASE NOTE - Actual Volleyball can technically be played with a keyboard, but it's definitely not the best way to experience the game. Using a controller is highly recommended.
972650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
